definition: an old or over-worked horse, insert as a plug
details:
noun
- an old or over-worked horse
= synonyms: jade
- an upright hydrant for drawing water to use in fighting a fire
= synonyms: fireplug, fire hydrant
- blockage consisting of an object designed to fill a hole tightly
= synonyms: stopper, stopple
- an electrical device with two or three pins that is inserted in a socket to make an electrical connection
= synonyms: male plug
- electrical device that fits into the cylinder head of an internal-combustion engine and ignites the gas by means of an electric spark
= synonyms: spark plug, sparking plug
- blatant or sensational promotion
= synonyms: ballyhoo, hoopla, hype
- a wad of something chewable as tobacco
= synonyms: chew
verb
- insert as a plug
= example: insert as a plug
- insert a plug into
= example: insert a plug into
- persist in working hard
= example: persist in working hard
= synonyms: plug away
- make a plug for
- deliver a quick blow to
- fill or close tightly with or as if with a plug
= example: fill or close tightly with or as if with a plug
= synonyms: secure
